info.title: Translation Management Service
info.description: Defines API endpoints for managing translations with features like creation, updates, search, and JSON export. Focuses on scalability, token-based authentication.

post.description: Logs in a user with their email and password
Logs out the authenticated user by revoking their current access token.
Creates a new user with the provided name, email, and password.

items.example: The email must be a valid email address.
The password confirmation does not match.

error.example: An error occurred while creating the user

post.description: Creates a new translation with a unique key, optional tags, and multiple language entries.

get.description: Retrieves a translation and its associated languages by the given ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the translation to retrieve

put.description: Updates an existing translation with new tags and language content.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the translation to update

delete.description: Deletes a translation and its associated languages by the given ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the translation to delete

error.example: An error occurred while deleting the translation.

get.description: Search translations by key, tags, or content. Filters are optional.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Content to search within the translations' languages

items.example: The key field must be a string.
The tags field must be a string.
The content field must be a string.

get.description: Exports translations in JSON format, optionally filtered by locale or other criteria.

error.example: An error occurred while exporting translations.

apiKey.description: API key for accessing the API
apiKey.name: X-API-KEY
